Bad breath (halitosis) is a common braces side effect due to food traps and dry mouth. Don’t let it dim your confidence—here’s how to freshen up.

Causes in Braces Wearers

  • Bacteria buildup in hard-to-clean areas.
  • Reduced saliva from mouth-breathing.

Fresh Breath Strategies

  1. Proxy Brushes: Clean between brackets and gums.
  2. Sugar-Free Gum: Chew xylitol gum to boost saliva.
  3. Tongue Scraping: Use a scraper to remove bacteria.
  4. Hydrate: Drink water to rinse away debris.
